author: hwright
msg: Let an internal function take a db/dir_abspath pair in place of an adm_access
baton.  Also, make the list of exlucded paths passed around be absolute paths.
(tweak_entries): Accept a db/abspath pair, and use them instead of fetching
(svn_wc__do_update_cleanup): Fetch the abspath, and pass it to
(remember_skipped_tree): Return an error, and make sure we remember an
(in_skipped_tree): Use an abspath for the skipped tree.
(close_edit): Set an abspath for the skipped tree.

author: hwright
msg: Remove a call to svn_wc_entries_read() by using the new wc_db APIs.
This is the first in a series of similarly-targeted changes which will
hopefully free us from the beast that is svn_wc_entry_t.
(tweak_entries): Use db_read_children(), and db_read_info() to iterate over
